text:
Haruki... you might be tensing up
your shoulders. Relax, relax.

I can't help it...
I overthink things easily...

It's okay, Haruki.
You've practiced a lot.
──If it seems like there's no way out,

Try to sing like you're walking around,
just like you did the other day.

────Fufu,
so... just like my usual self?

Okay...
I'll keep that in mind and do my best...!
